---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/solana/undelegate/get-flow-status-deactivated
---

To refresh the transaction state and get the latest status of the existing flow we'll be using the flow id from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/b5fb1f97-bd9d-4207-bfe1-112d33309820' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `cool_down` to `deactivated`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "b5fb1f97-bd9d-4207-bfe1-112d33309820",
  "state": "deactivated",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "create_withdraw_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "amount",
          "display": "Amount",
          "description": "",
          "type": "decimal",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "presence",
              "options": {}
            },
            {
              "type": "numericality",
              "options": {
                "greater_than": 0
              }
            },
            {
              "type": "precision",
              "options": {
                "max": 9
              }
            },
            {
              "type": "numericality",
              "options": {
                "on": "with_on_chain_validations",
                "less_than_or_equal_to": "1.5",
                "if": "stake_account_balance"
              }
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "funding_account_pubkey",
          "display": "Funding Account Pubkey",
          "description": "",
          "type": "string",
          "validations": []
        },
        {
          "name": "recipient_pubkey",
          "display": "Recipient Pubkey",
          "description": "",
          "type": "string",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "presence",
              "options": {}
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "stake_account_pubkey": "FNN2VwQy5TMkVegyXyejbwKL5S1SvRkmYHkoK62FReo7",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "deactivate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "2eynfQTjXTcJSTmsVSgPKNefVLKG6sJEx1ArhtWqieHXuQ3UnYHvcvaArscjsaCz2WBuSTTALNf6rAaCj9iN8Ddk",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "delegation_active_amount": "0.0",
    "delegation_inactive_amount": "1497717120.0",
    "delegation_status": "inactive",
    "delegation_status_error": null,
    "recipient_pubkey": null,
    "withdraw_amount": null,
    "withdraw_transaction": null,
    "withdraw_transaction_funding_account_pubkey": null,
    "estimated_inactive_at": "2022-10-07T14:30:23.200Z"
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-10-05T17:37:31.573Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-07T16:52:11.390Z"
}
```
